alert.note: Alert for Coastal Gulf; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 09 at 10:16AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Gulf, southwestern Liberty and northwestern Franklin Counties through 1115 AM EST/1015 AM CST/... At 1015 AM EST/915 AM CST/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southwest of Mexico Beach, or 11 miles west of Port St. Joe, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Port St. Joe, Mexico Beach, Honeyville, Buck Siding, Highland View, St Joseph State Park, Ward Ridge, Milltown, Howard Creek, Willis Landing, Beacon Hill, Dalkeith, Saint Joe Beach and Fort Gadsden. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 PM EST/noon CST/ for Big Bend of and the Panhandle of Florida.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Gulf; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf; Liberty
